org.cooperari.core

Class CThreadMappings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cooperari.core.CThreadMappings

  • public final class CThreadMappings
extends Object
    Provides mapping from Thread objects to objects.

    The execution of each (explicitly) started Thread instances is accomplished by a CThread instance. This class records such associations to support thread yield points.

    Since:
    0.2

      Create a Thread-to-CThread association.
      CThread getCThread(Thread t)
      Gets the CThread instance that renders the execution of a given Thread, or the given thread instance if it is already a cooperative thread.

    • Method Detail

      • getCThread

        public CThread getCThread(Thread t)
                   throws CInternalError
        Gets the CThread instance that renders the execution of a given Thread, or the given thread instance if it is already a cooperative thread.
        Parameters:
        t - Thread.
        Returns:
        CThread instance.
        Throws:
        CInternalError - If no t has no association to a cooperative thread.

      • associate

        public void associate(Thread t,
                      CThread ct)
        Create a Thread-to-CThread association.
        Parameters:
        t - Thread.
        ct - Cooperative thread.
        Throws:
        CInternalError - If t is a cooperative thread or is already associated to to a cooperative thread.
